Lawrence.Asa and Sylvester Abbot House: The Asa and Sylvester Abbot House is a historic two-family house at 15-17 Porter Road in Andover, Massachusetts. Built in the 1830s, it is a rare local example of the duplex in a rural setting. It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1982, where it is incorrectly listed at 15-17 Andover Street.
